title: Can't complete sync on Sepolia with Beacon backfilling failed
body:
We started to sync Sepolia testnet, but got an error like below.
We cleared sync data and tried to resync many times, but the sync stop at near 1446315 every time.
Do you know what should we do?
```

```

```
	SepoliaChainConfig = &ChainConfig{

		PetersburgBlock:               big.NewInt(0),
		IstanbulBlock:                 big.NewInt(0),
		MuirGlacierBlock:              big.NewInt(0),
		BerlinBlock:                   big.NewInt(0),
		LondonBlock:                   big.NewInt(0),
		TerminalTotalDifficulty:       big.NewInt(17_000_000_000_000_000),
		TerminalTotalDifficultyPassed: true,

```
The TTD is `17_000_000_000_000_000`, why are you setting `--override.terminaltotaldifficulty 50000000000000000 ` ? 

```
17_000_000_000_000_000
50_000_000_000_000_000
```
So if the 'main' sepolia switched at `17`, the difficulty will never grow up to `50`.
This is the last pow block on sepolia: https://sepolia.etherscan.io/block/1450408
